Hero.headline: Real Estate Solutions that Elevate Ambition
Hero.subheading: We’re building tomorrow’s communities—today, across Saudi Arabia.

About.title: About Us
About.paragraph:
Althyab Global Company is a leading Saudi investment and development firm committed to shaping the future of real estate and commerce across the Kingdom.
We believe that property is more than structures — it’s about creating vibrant, livable environments grounded in quality, integrity, and long-term value.
With a bold vision and deep market insight, we deliver residential, commercial, and mixed-use projects that reflect Saudi Arabia’s aspirations and contribute to its Vision 2030 goals.

Goals.title: Our Goals
list: Build residential communities rooted in sustainable principles.
Achieve 95%+ customer satisfaction on every project.
Apply cutting-edge smart-building technology in construction and management.
Advance Saudi Vision 2030 by creating new employment opportunities.
Maintain full transparency and world-class quality & governance standards.

Footer.rights: © {year} Althyab Global Company. All rights reserved.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: For bookings or inquiries, reach us directly:

home.title: Althyab Global Company — Saudi Real Estate & Investment
home.description: A leading Saudi investment and real-estate development firm delivering residential and commercial projects aligned with Vision 2030.

ceo.name: Eng. Hebas Jalal Al-Gharmoul
ceo.title: Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
ceo.message:
At Althyab Global Investment Company, we place our clients and investors at the heart of our vision, working to transform their aspirations into tangible investment opportunities that deliver true value and distinction.

Our goal is to be an active partner in shaping the future of real estate investment in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by offering innovative solutions and exceptional projects that meet market expectations and align with the ambitions of Saudi Vision 2030.

Our commitment to quality, transparency, and building trust forms the foundation upon which we create sustainable success and long-term partnerships, contributing to the growth of the national economy and leaving a positive impact on the community as a whole.
ceo.quote: Quality, transparency, and trust are the pillars of our partnership.
